title: Phenomenological Exploration to Overcome Intergenerational Learning Barriers [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in organizational communication and basic language proficiency
context.additional_context: Operated as an embedded module within a language education course for public institution administrative staff. Aims to promote intergenerational collaboration in blended learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three major intergenerational barrier factors (personal, relational, managerial)
Learners can analyze and structure intergenerational conflict cases within organizations using a phenomenological approach
Learners can propose two methods for intergenerational knowledge sharing using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
